becauseLifeRunYou.lifeMovesTooFastDescription: People are overwhelmed by constant demands, decisions, and pressure.
becauseLifeRunYou.mostFeelLikeTheyAreJustReacting: Most feel like they’re just reacting
becauseLifeRunYou.mostFeelLikeTheyAreJustReactingDescripti: There’s no time to think, plan, or choose — only to respond to what’s urgent.
becauseLifeRunYou.growthGetsPushedAsideDescription: Personal priorities are delayed. Real needs are ignored. Nothing changes.
becauseLifeRunYou.adviceIsntEnoughDescription: Information is everywhere. What’s missing is structure, support, and accountability.
becauseLifeRunYou.progressNeedsASystemDescription: Without clarity and consistency, motivation fades and problems repeat.
becauseLifeRunYou.thatsWhyWeBuiltThisProject: That’s why we built this project
becauseLifeRunYou.thatsWhyWeBuiltThisProjectDescription: To help people grow, act, and take control — with expert support at every step.
becauseLifeRunYou.becauseLifeShouldntRunYouDescription: We didn’t build this project just to offer coaching. We built it to give people a way to take back control — with real tools and real support.

coachingThatFits.careerCoachingQuestion: Feel stuck, lost, or unsure what to do next in your work life?
coachingThatFits.careerCoachingAnswer: We help you make clear decisions about your job, direction, or next step.
coachingThatFits.personalCoachingQuestion: Tired, overwhelmed, or unable to focus on yourself?
coachingThatFits.personalCoachingAnswer: We help you reduce pressure, regain energy, and handle daily challenges.
coachingThatFits.relationshipAndCommunicationCoachingQues: Struggling with conflict, unclear boundaries, or feeling misunderstood?
coachingThatFits.relationshipAndCommunicationCoachingAnsw: We help you improve how you talk, listen, and connect with others.
coachingThatFits.growthAndLongTermSupportQuestion: You’ve tried on your own — but the change doesn’t last?
coachingThatFits.growthAndLongTermSupportAnswer: We help you stay consistent, build better habits, and move forward step by step.

forOngoingWorks.forOngoingWorksTitle: For Ongoing Work and Bigger Goals
forOngoingWorks.forOngoingWorksDescription: If your situation touches multiple areas — work, relationships, personal direction — our packages are built to support you with a structured, ongoing approach.

hero.heroTitle: Life Doesn’t Rule You. You Do.

needExtraSupport.needExtraSupportDescription: Don’t hesitate to contact us. We’re available 24/7 to help you move forward, overcome obstacles, and choose the right path for your growth.

programsThatHelp.programsThatHelpTitle: Programs That Help You Start Without the Pressure
programsThatHelp.programsThatHelpDescription: Not ready for individual coaching? Start with a program.
programsThatHelp.programsThatHelpDescription2: Our programs are short, structured, and focused on specific topics. You receive step-by-step guidance by email and can request support during the program. It’s a simple way to see how we work — and how much real change is possible.

startSmall.readPracticalOnSiteArticles: Read practical, on-site articles with tools, reflection exercises, and simple step-by-step methods to help you improve on your own.

aboutTheProjectDetails.text1: Stress levels have tripled in the last 30 months.
aboutTheProjectDetails.text2: The ability of individuals to influence their own lives has dropped by 46% since 2022.
aboutTheProjectDetails.text3: The average time it takes someone to make a major life shift on their own is 5 years.
aboutTheProjectDetails.text4: The modern pace of life is not slowing down. Without deliberate, structured coaching, you’re not just standing still — you’re falling behind.

aboutTheProjectOurTeam.text5: So no matter what area of life is in focus, you’ll work with someone who truly understands it.

weHere.title: We’re here to reinvent your life — it’s up to you where to start.

aboutTheProjectWhoWeAre.text1: Qoacher is a team of 11 professionals with decades of combined experience in psychology, executive coaching, relationship dynamics, and personal development.

aboutTheProject.title:
Because Life Won’t
Wait for You to Catch Up

services.careerCoachingDescription: If you’re stuck, lost, or thinking about changing direction, we help you make clear decisions, prepare for the next step, and take control of your work life.

programsProducts.buildingUnshakableBoundariesTitle: Building Unshakable Boundaries: 10 Days to Take Back Your Life
programsProducts.buildingUnshakableBoundariesDescription: Weak or missing boundaries drain energy, create resentment, and leave you feeling out of control. This 10‑day program helps you set clear limits, say “no” without guilt, and take back control of your time, energy, and relationships — at your own pace.
programsProducts.buildingUnshakableBoundariesIncludes1: Why Boundaries Matter More Than Ever
programsProducts.buildingUnshakableBoundariesIncludes3: The Cost of Saying “Yes” Too Much
programsProducts.breakingTheCycleOfOverthinkingTitle: Breaking the Cycle of Overthinking: 10 Days to Clearer Decisions
programsProducts.breakingTheCycleOfOverthinkingDescriptio: Overthinking steals time, energy, and peace of mind — and it keeps people stuck. This 10‑day program helps you break the mental loops, make decisions faster, and free yourself from the constant “what ifs” that drain your life.
